text: Light band kar de, mereko sona hai
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Mai ulti chalaunga. Tu attack karna.
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Mai nahi hota to kya hota tera? 
I have literally carried you over the past 4 years. Har cheez ka reminder dena padta hai tujhe. Memoirs likh de ye bhi bolna hi padega I know. Itna careless hai tu. And you had a right to confront me if I failed to carry you xD.
Ek din tujhe uthane ka try kiya, tu nahi utha and TOC ka quiz ho gaya. Kitna sunaya tune mereko bc us baat pe.

Only reason why you‚Äôd be spared from being called ‚Äúthe stingy one‚Äù - Goel. Ek watch khareedne ke liye 10 order karega, use karega fir 9 return karega. Wtf? Who does that? Tera brush karte karte gaane sunne wala dance was epic.

Meri slippers wapas karde.

Also bc tereko har exam se pehle nightout marna rehta tha. Like wtf? Exam se pehle to sona hota hai. Light band hona hoga. How did we even manage all that shit?

I‚Äôm telling you 50 tak job mat karna yaar. Its shit. Live life. I‚Äôll keep on telling you this till 50. 

Funny thing - apan dono Marathi hoke hindi me baat karte hai. I don‚Äôt even know what your Marathi sounds like. Remember how I was unhappy even after getting placed at Plutus? I called Pandey 3-4 times to see if he could do anything to get me into Zomato. Reason? Kyuki tera waha hua tha. Yaar most heartbreaking cheez ki tu Gurgaon and mai Bangalore. Like wtf man? I am actually not ready to comprehend this. Sab bol rhe hai ki touch me rahenge but I don‚Äôt know. Virtual communication is not the same. After all,  I‚Äôm too much used to you. I‚Äôm used to being with you 24/7, used to beating the shit out of you, used to carrying you all your life, used to being shouted at on failing to do so. Chhod bc, mereko referral de dena, mai Zomato aa jaunga. 

Also its crazy how you hadn‚Äôt talked to a single girl in your life before. I‚Äôm sure you gonna be the chick magnet in Gurgaon soon (shakal disagrees but not me). 

I know Goa aane ke liye tereko convince karna was tough but maja aya. Kayaking shit was the best. Also doraemon ki umar me sharaab piyega? Ashish ko batau? 

Ryuzaki >>>> Mochamocha.

P.S. I‚Äôve seen your you-know-what.
P.P.S. Girls reading this, its big.
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Bro‚Ä¶.. Kaafi colorful personality aur itne chill. Hats off. Literally Kratik sabko batata hai tere chillpanti ke kisse. Saathme maje kiye kaafi lol. Milenge milenge.
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Bhai chaliye football khelte hai. Visca el Barca, Visca Catalunya!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Gang-war se kitna achha nickname banta but jassa ne bakait bana diya tereko. . Bahut paisa bachega tera kyuki 1 peg me hi tereko chadh jati hai. Teri drunk dancing is the best I have ever seen. Kitna passion, kitni sexy adaye! Tera personal photographer bana tha mai Goa aur uske baad. Itna photogenic hai tu and you are so confident in front of the camera. Aur to aur pics post bhi kar leta hai tu (unlike us jo kabhi pics post nahi kar payenge). Ever thought of modelling as a career?. Goa ke pehle we were not so close. Time kaha hota tha tere paas. Bas assignments aur exam ke time ham yaad ate the tereko. Fir bolta hai ham tere sachhe dost nahi hai (you were drunk, remember hall 13 ground at 5 am?). IAS to tu majak majak me nikal lega. Aur ab to rr chhod de. You are so good bro, you‚Äôd get everything you ever wanted. Stay awesome and keep in touch.
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Bakait : "Aaj ke baad mai kabhi nahi piunga"

Also Bakait : "Yaar pay kiya hai to le hi leta hu"

10 pegs later

Bakait: "Mujhe nahi chadhi hai bro"
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Areeeeeeeeeeeeeee! Usko nahi dena tha!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: With great phone (IQOO 7) comes great responsibility (of installing a fucking game). Candy crush to khel le yaar kamse kam
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Areeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee! Usko nahi dena tha! Ye wala tera catchphrase maine hi discover kiya tha. You‚Äôre welcome. You wont even remember this - starting me mereko (mistakenly) lagta tha ki tu bhi vibrant me tha mere saath so I was extra friendly with you. Mai roj tereko hi karta tha if you remember. Tu sochta hoga bc kyu kar rha hai ye lol. Usi se apni friendship itni develop hui. Summer me kya maje kiye bc apan ne. You were so nice - roj cooler bhar deta tha. Aur bc SoC ka pura backend ka kam tune kiya tha. Second year summer yaad hai? Econometrics lol. Kuch bhi tha bc wo to. Bina prob stats ke pass kara diya tune. We lost count apan ne kitne pizzas saath me khaye honge. Goel is incomplete without pizza. (Thank me for that pizza wala pic). Also, apne batch ke awards hote to The Most Chindi award tereko jaata. Bro ab paise ki chinta chhod. IQOO 7 liya hai - gaming phone, but ek bhi game nahi khelta xD. Bangalore me sath me rehna hai. Pata hai na? Maine tereko book kiya hai sabse pehle roomie ke liye. Aag laga denge Bangalore me. 
P.S. Goa kyu nahi aya be?
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Will miss all the fun we had during placements. The late-night chats, the hopeless crying sessions, the "check if all questions are same", etc won't be forgotten for long. All hail "Saviour"!. I will remember for life how I didn't study a single Topology lecture and still managed to pass. Hope we'll meet many times in the future. After all, Bangalore it is. Don't ever change. I hope to get a new job with you giving all my tests, XD
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Abe yaar XYZ company ka application ka deadline badha do
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Yo bro! Apan to birthday twins hai. Birthday se yaad aya, first year me treat di thi apan ne ek saath hall 10 canteen me. Uska paisa abhi tak nahi lautaya hai tu xD. Bc ab seedha JP Morgan ke HR ko expense submit karunga. Remember raat ke 3:45 baje apan thand me jaate the roll khane just shop band hone se pehle? Teri aur Mukesh ki ladaiya sab mere paas hai recorded. Thanks for all the help during interns and placements. I really can‚Äôt thank you more. Tere bina nahi ho paat kuch.
P.S. Sameer belongs to all of us!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
No words, just prayer! Just kidding. I‚Äôm actually the one who thinks calling you god doesn‚Äôt make justice to your hard-work and dedication. Calling you god just feels like you are granted. But truly, I‚Äôve never seen someone as hardworking as you. Keep working as you do and one day I hope (nope I‚Äôm sure) I‚Äôll be able to see something truly unbelievable from you. Stay as awesome as you are.
P.S. Thoda chill bhi mar liya kar. Even god needs rest.
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Hi Kishan, You are one of the most humble and the most talented person I have ever met, it's been a pleasure knowing you bro. We have been together in many courses and had g some nice talks together. Remember Mahesh from TA lab? Also CGS me kaafi help ki. I hope our paths cross again someday ü§û. Meanwhile, all the best man üëç, let's try to do great things in life. Stay awesome as always!‚úåÔ∏è
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Bartomeu la hijo de puta!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Kem palty? 
bhai bhai
bhai bhai

First year me you were just some wingie for me. But ab, you are one of the most imp ppl in my life (haan admit kar rha hu. will use in future debates). Just when I was abou to think ki koi kisi ka saga nahi hota bc, you arrived saying ‚Äòfuck you bitch‚Äô. From ‚ÄúBarca ki away kit leni hai yaar, chhod na,job lagte hi original lenge showroom se‚Äù  to ‚ÄúChalo Qatar chalte hai world cup dekhne‚Äù we moved but deep inside we know that this isn‚Äôt just about football. Football isn‚Äôt even 10% of our friendship.

You are literally Esmeralda - so versatile. Sab kuch kar lega - magna, football, movies, anime, etc. Ek word ke bina ye memoir khatam nahi ho sakta - moderator. Jee haan. Tu hai yaar, tu hai. Its not like you dont have your stand but you prefer to be neutral. Har debate me moderating karega but jab khud ki baari aye, chadh jayega. Noice it is.

Aur maine dono seasons fpl me tere se upar finish kiya hai and btw teri wajah se paisa haara hu mai kaafi dream 11 me. Bc itna ameer hoke mereko paisa nahi diya betting ke liye kabhi. 

Btw tereko backpain hai kya? Mereko hai. Our back hurts bro - by carrying the Goa trip lol. Bro kayaking yaad hai? Best thing ever. Best 60 minutes of my life. Man kar rha tha yahi rahu. . Tu jab bola mereko fever hai mai nahi aa payega - literally my thoughts : isko covid ho sakta hai but ma chudaye, saath me covid positive honge but Goa jayenge, Its a miracle apan ko Goa me kaise covid nahi hua. But destiny - covid saath me ho hi gaya campus pe. I was really looking forward to playing football with you in campus but next time. 

Stay as awesome as you are. Bhag ke kaha jayega? Saath hi gujarna hai jindagi apan ko. Qatar jana hi hai. Mai chhodega nahi tereko.

P.S. Mere agendas nahi hote. Mai potential se judge karta hu player ko.
Love you too!
Koeman to nahi bacha paya. Bolo Xavi bachayega Barca ko. Visca el barca, visca catalunya! üî¥üîµ
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Ab to Laporta hi bachayega Barca ko!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Jai Maharashtra bhava! Jamner che wagh ahat tumhi. Ek din saath me ‚Äòdesi daru theka‚Äô pe jaayenge cash leke aur Chivas Regal khareedenge. Also bhusawal platform number 4 was so lit. Milenge bhai future me pakka. Tu jo khamba bolega wo mai launga. Stay awesome as you are!
P.S. Tere 69 memoirs ho chuke hai. Sorry to spoil it!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Are you know? Oh, never mind. Aree B----C----. Mini militia god. (I know aap cheating karte the lol). Tum jitna pragmatic insaan nahi dekha maine apne life me. Har cheez safe khelna hai. First year me galiya nahi dete the - BC bolte the, koi sunke complain na karde isliye. Your shayris are world-class. Mereko bhejte rehna. And also I‚Äôm gonna tell her someday that you have a crush on her coz you simply won‚Äôt. Competitive nature to hai hi aapme. Aur kitni books padhoge wannabe philosopher? I‚Äôm sure aap apply bhi karoge apne life me ye sab. Such a unique person you are. Stay as you are. See ya!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Bas karo FIFA khelna. Real football khel lo
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Where to start? Bihari prince Mukesh ji kumar. Mini militia khelte time pata chala aap colour blind nahi ham ko hi bachpan se colours galat sikhaye gaye hai. Yaar FIFA khelna chhod de yaar plz. Bahut bakwas hai wo. Play actual football na. Feel bad ki leg injury ke wajah se tum khel nahi paye, pics nahi le paye but I promise you ham saath me ek din jarur karenge ye sab. Bhai itne dedicated Juve fan ho tum. Kasam se, jo aadmi apni team ke liye Seria A dekh leta hai uske dedication pe doubt nahi karte. Kaafi stubborn ho tum. 2-3 mahine baate nahi karoge fir khud se hi aake puchoge ‚ÄúFIFA khelega kya baby?‚Äù. Also wtf? Mera memoir galat likhe ho tum. Apni bonding 2nd year me start hui thi? Wtf? High ho kya? Bsdk mth102 tere bed pe aake kaun padhaya tha tereko? Rishikesh trip was so fun. Tum unko ditch karke hamare saath aa gaye the rafting karne. It was more fun, right? . Baki sab ka I don‚Äôt know but ye ek miracle hai ki mujhe COVID hua but tujhe nahi. Mai literally tere saath hota tha pura din-raat. Horror movies dekhte the bc apan kyuki tera dar kam ho. You are the most big-hearted person I have ever known. Don‚Äôt ever change. Ek din visit karenge tumhare saath Bihar. 
P.S. Jyada nahi likha hai coz I know we won‚Äôt get out of touch
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Bahut tez ho rhe ho Mukesh!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Raja babu, mereko cash dedo. Mera credit card use kar lena lol
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Raja Babu: Tumhara number literally mere phone me Babu name se saved hai. Gharwalo ne dekh liya tha ki kisi ‚ÄòBabu‚Äô ka call aa rha mereko lol. Tumko describe karna hua to - god amongst men. Literally har cheez me chaapu - dashing, stylish, kind, sophisticated yet simple. Mera ek basic method tha logo ko judge karne ka (inspired from Sherlock). About you I thought ki bahut ameer hai, bahut show-off karega. But‚Ä¶. wtf? show-off to tum karte hi ho lol. Just kidding. Kaafi down to earth aadmi ho tum. Apna memory wall to kaafi diversely painted hai -  Vibrant se shuru hui, ab pata nahi kaha tak jayegi. 2nd year me apan achhe dost bane. Rishikesh trip was awesome, we missed you very much in Goa. But dont worry there are many more trips to go. Most people are writing parting messages but we know we aren‚Äôt. We are gonna start a new chapter together in Bangalore. We‚Äôll destroy B‚Äôlore. We both - wannabe photographers.
P.S. Perks of being together - we don‚Äôt have to miss out on pics. We can take each others‚Äô
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Ay yo chaapu! Tumhari chaapne ka talent describe karunga to words kam pad jayenge. But wo rehne do sabko pata hi hai. Remember that time at the lunch table - raat ko UCL match tha Liverpool vs Napoli. You said ki are easy win for Liverpool. I said ki nahi bro, Napoli jeet sakti hai. Guess what? Napoli did win that day lol and I was searching for you everywhere xD. Btw it was so fun together. Assignments, quizzes, exams sab saath me bc. Nahi karta to mai pass nahi ho paata. Thanks for it and keep in touch. Stay awesome as you are.
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Hi bro! It was nice meeting, chatting with you. Hope so Bangalore me milenge. Stay awesome as always!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Kutte! Kitna kuch khilaya hai maine tereko. Bhulna mat. Kitna energetic hai bc tu. Kabhi bhi dekh lo, ful on enthu. Sports ke bare me nahi bolunga. Sab bol diye honge. Nisheeka ko bata de mai hi tha chat karne wala. Kitne logo se chat karwaye bc tune. Gharwalo ko bolkar shadi fix kara le. Mai ayega. AOT maine tereko dikhaya tha, uska thanks bol. Itna movies mat dekha kar bc, thoda chill bhi mar le. And one of the trait of yours- being melodramatic. Kuch bhi hoga, gussa kar ke baith jayega. Mahine-mahine to baat bhi nahi karta tha. But deep down, everyone knew it ki kuch time baad fir se khud baat karne ayega as if nothing had happened. I still don‚Äôt understand ki tu itna magne kabse lag gaya? First year me apan saath me baithke chill karte the aur fir exam me hag dete the. Gurgaon me chill marna. Paisa hi paisa hoga. You are such an ambitious person. But remember, you earn money to spend it. Live life and fulfill your dreams. Nahi to paisa kama lega but jindagi piche reh jayegi. Milte rehna, tu to milega hi. Aa jayega merese treat lene. Whenever you read this, just remember I‚Äôll be there for you.
Btw hagga is paar is the best!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Sutta hai?
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Ham sabse pehle Mukesh ke pehchan se mile the. Tabse aajtak Mukesh se jyada close friends hai ham (xD). Shayris mast karte ho tum. Jyada suna nahi but ofc itne vibrant thoughts hai tumhare ki shayri karna jyada mushkil nahi padta hoga lol. Tumhara work out journey dekhke sach me inspiration aata hai. Treat doge na? Life me first time maal tumhare saath mara hai hamne. I look forward to more bhand times xD. Honestly, tum bhand aur normal same lagte ho. Already itne jasbaati ho tum ki nashe ki jarurat hi nahi padti. Bhai shashak hamare Hagrid ho yar tum. Har news mai twitter pe dekhne se pehle aa jati hai tumse. I even say ki chalo yaar bana lete hai ek news acc twitter pe. Maja ayega. Koeman to nahi bacha paya. Bolo Xavi bachayega Barca ko. Visca el barca, visca catalunya! Yaar Mumbai me kyu jaa rhe ho? Kuch bhi karke Bangalore aa jao. Maje karenge. Stay awesome as always!
P.S. Qatar jana hai bhai. Kuch bhi ho jaaye.
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: We believe in Laporta supremacy!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: You were the first guy I met at IITK. Initial impressions? Bahut bolta hai bc. But never even once I thought ki chup ho ja. Itni meethi meethi baate bolta hai tu ki sunte hi jaate hai sab. I even thought ki you may be a manipulator (kya karu? Duniya bahut buri hai. Dimag me sab negative hi aata tha). But wtf? Itna achha aadmi nikla tu. And yo, how tf do you store so much info in that little (jk) brain of yours? I‚Äôll never forget those nightouts between Lamba and us where we convinced him that you won‚Äôt find a girl here and just get yourself married. Ragging me bhi to saath me the apan. And how tf do you take a bathe so frickin quickly? Literally 2-3 minute me khatam. Bc tere karan mai bina brush kiye breakfast karne lag gaya. Lucknow was class and Rishikesh was fun. Wouldn't have been without you. Yaar tu jab hasta hai, pure wing ko pata chalta hai. Dikkat ye bhi nahi hai. Dikkat ye hai ki tu hasta hi rehta hai lol. Never stop laughing. Milte rahenge nahi bolunga coz milna is compulsory. Fuck pademic, milna is necessary. Abhi Gurgaon ja rha hai. Waha se seedha Delhi jayega (IAS ke liye) I know. Signing off Mr. Senator. Btw hagga is paar is the best!
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Abe brush to kar le breakfast se pehle
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text: Ham tumhra do tho memoir likhenge
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
Data god, tumhara personality itna godlike hai ki kya bataye. Tumhara barin hardcoded hai ye sach lag rha ab. Itna complicated cheez automatically to ban hi nahi sakta. Goa ane se pehle I told Ojas ki tum data god ho. Usko laga aise hi hoga. But ghar jaate hi usne bola mereko ki yaar kasam se tum uske bhi beyond ho. (But Goa me data fail hua tha xD). 2nd year me kya room partner the. Tumhara lifelong bed pe pada hua position sabko pata hai. Jindagi ka ek half to gujare hoge tum usme nahi? Tank khelna sikha do yaar hamko.
P.S. Mahbus tumhara imitation muhjse achha koi nahi kar sakta, admit it.
author: Rushikesh  Najan

text:
First encounter - tera hair fall serum ka delivery maine liye tha lol. Itne intelligent hai sir aap. Kuch to technological advancement laoge aap to I bet on you. I‚Äôll be waiting to read your research papers. And yes, Nole is the best and Messi is the GOAT.
P.S. Ek match ho jaaye tennis ka?

text: First time mile tab my reaction - yaar ye itna shaant kyu hai? Kuch to bolo. Fir I thought ki IIT me log aise hi hote honge but you were the shy type in the beginning. Par ek baar khul gaye to kya hi dekhna. You are literally the nicest person I‚Äôve met at IITK You are probably the only person jiski maine bitching nahi ki hai lol. One thing many people won‚Äôt notice about you - you are really picky. Har cheez ka opinion hai tera. Yet you are so adaptable. I still don‚Äôt know the exact reason why you dropped out in first year. I guess I‚Äôm a terrible friend xD. Mussoorie ke mountains me apan dono scooty pe 100+ ke speed pe chal rhe the lol. Accident hota to bhi regret nahi hota itna maja aa rha tha us time to. Aur btw tera wo laptop replace karwane me bhi alag maje aye the xD. Thanks for taking care of me when I got my ankle sprained.
author: Rushikesh  Najan
